input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
sentences: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! Connect with language teachers from all over the world, and learn at your own pace.

Looking for a way to improve your language skills? Look no further than LangLang! Our app connects you to language teachers from all over the world, so you can get the personalized instruction you need to improve your language skills.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you'll be able to find the perfect tutor for your needs.

input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: friendly, casual

Audience: frequent travellers
sentences: Ready to learn a new language? Look no further than LangLang! We're the ultimate app for traveller groups looking to connect with language teachers from all over the world.

LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world. Teacher can remotely access teaching resources, chat, and share lessons with one another. Whether you're travelling for business or pleasure, LangLang has the perfect app for you!

If you're looking for an easy way to find local language teachers in your area, LangLang is the perfect app for you! With our simple user interface, you can find language classes and teachers near you in minutes. Plus, our user-friendly search tool lets you find the right teacher for your needs, whether you're looking for a one-time lesson or a regular relationship.
